INSERT INTO TBL_DONA_COMMENT(DONA_COMMENT_NO, DONA_COMMENT_CONTENT, DONA_NO, DONA_COMMENT_WRITER) VALUES (#{donaCommentNo}, #{donaCommentContent}, #{donaNo}, #{donaCommentWriter})
mapper.select: SELECT dc.DONA_NO, dc.DONA_COMMENT_NO, dc.DONA_COMMENT_CONTENT, dc.DONA_COMMENT_REGIDATE, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS COMMENT_WRITER_NAME FROM TBL_DONA_COMMENT dc LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON dc.DONA WHERE dc.DONA_NO = #{donaNo}

SELECT RNUM, dc.DONA_COMMENT_NO, dc.DONA_COMMENT_CONTENT, dc.DONA_COMMENT_REGIDATE, COMMENT_WRITER_NAME FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, dc.DONA_COMMENT_NO, dc.DONA_COMMENT_CONTENT, dc.DONA_COMMENT_REGIDATE, CASE WHEN MOD(dc.DONA_COMMENT_WRITER, 10) = 1 THEN m.MEMBER_NAME WHEN MOD(dc.DONA_COMMENT_WRITER, 10) = 2 THEN cm.CENTER_MEMBER_NAME END AS COMMENT_WRITER_NAME FROM TBL_DONA_COMMENT dc LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON MOD(dc.DONA_COMMENT_WRITER, 10) = 1 AND dc.DONA_COMMENT_WRITER = m.MEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_CENTER_MEMBER cm ON MOD(dc.DONA_COMMENT_WRITER, 10) = 2 AND dc.DONA_COMMENT_WRITER = cm.CENTER_MEMBER_NO WHERE dc.DONA_NO = #{donaNo} ORDER BY dc.DONA_COMMENT_REGIDATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{criteria.page} * #{criteria.amount} + 1 ) WHERE RNUM > (#{criteria.page} - 1) * #{criteria.amount}
